alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 9:07PM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Livingston Area, Northern Park, and Paradise Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult tonight into Saturday with roads becoming snow packed and visibility poor. This includes the Bozeman Pass vicinity.
info.instruction: People should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
